rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with eco-friendly lighting and natural ventilation. Vastu compliant placement ensuring positive energy flow.
An open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to allow maximum natural light and fresh air. Made of sustainable materials.
A modern, energy-efficient open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, equipped with eco-friendly appliances and ample ventilation.
Luxury master bedroom on ground level featuring a private balcony for fresh air and natural light. Designed following Vastu principles ensuring tranquility.
Private ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom with eco-friendly fixtures and ample storage.

openings.description: A robust, sustainable door with integrated weatherproofing and natural aesthetics.
Large windows ensuring abundant daylight and energy efficiency, aligned with Vastu principles for positive airflow.
Door leading to a private balcony that maximizes natural light and ventilation.

additional_features.description: A luxury swimming pool integrated into the eco-friendly design, with sustainable water management systems.

vastu_notes.note: The main entrance and living areas are aligned along the North-East axis to attract positive energy. The kitchen is placed away from the master bedroom as per Vastu guidelines.

sustainability_features.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows are designed to maximize natural light while reducing energy consumption.
Utilizes locally sourced, sustainable materials in construction for reduced environmental impact.
The design encourages cross-ventilation throughout all living spaces to minimize the use of air conditioning.
